title: Truth is no defense
author: VD
content_html:
The OC contemplates the land that was once Canada:

While the Canadians had never been great fans of free trade or free speech, in the above quote we find proof of their final descent into madness. For in the new nation of Khanadistan, it is now the official position of the government that truth is no defense against the accusation of hate speech.

But at least Khanuckistanis have the right to wait in line for health care without paying for the privilege.
